reviews.review_msg: Dr Holt is really good, I learned a lot. Course has 2 exams non cumulative, 2 assignments and 1 group presentation that is about an hour long with questioning. lots of guest lectures and you get lots of cool perspectives. The course covers a variety of topics. Would recommend!

Fair quizzes/assignments, clear grading criteria, if you're interested in genomics take MBB 462 it will give you an overview of relevant topics and very cool guest lectures. Dr. Holt is very down-to-earth, helpful, and does amazing research- my favorite prof at SFU, really respect him, highly recommend him- thank you Dr. Holt, you're awesome!
